messages.content: omg williamm
sorry is me again
Hello
im looking for the creativity book
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1, P. (2003) Corporate Creativity: The Winning Edge. Tata McGraw-Hill Title. (0-07-049949-7)
i tried searching for the free version of the textbook you have mention, but it requires to be bought. Even our vitalsource also can't find this book
cancan no worries, thank you so much
im in LKS rn, so I just approach the staff will do?
So, you may have to head over to LKS to borrow its physical copy, sorry about it
No worries, really appreciate your help T.T
From my side, i can see there's 3 physical copies available now
yay I found it
but is by another author
I think should be fine, thank you so much for your help

The author is
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_3, PERSON_LASTNAME_3 N, just that they use short form to represent the full name
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1, P. (2003) Corporate Creativity: The Winning Edge. Tata McGraw-Hill Title. (0-07-049949-7)

The author is
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_3, PERSON_LASTNAME_3 N?
thank you so much
my bad
No problem, any more things i can help?
nope, thank you so much
have a great evening
Thank you and have a nice evening ahead :)
ohhh okok
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Hi, this is PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2. How may I help you?
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 : Hi I do not have access to one of my readings on JSTOR although i have tried logging in through the institution
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Sure. May I have the details to the readings please?
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 : The title is, Empires of the weak : the real story of European expansion and the creation of the new world order
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Hmm... Please give me a moment.
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : The links are working fine
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Can you try logging in with an in-cognito browser
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 : Ok will do
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Which chapter are you thinking of downloading?
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 : chapter 1
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Oh good
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : No problem
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Is there anything else I can assist?
Hi PERSON_FIRSTNAME_4 how can i help you?
Hi I am looking for an article named "Ikea invades America" by PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 PERSON_LASTNAME_3
I checked Ebsco host, initially, i saw it there. But now it is gone.
let me do a search in the database. give me a min
Ok thank you
it is by Harvard business school
i can't find it in Ebscohost database.
it is actually a HBS case which needs to be bought from HBS website
https://www.hbs.edu/faculty/Pages/item.aspx?num=31121
PERSON_LASTNAME_5
Okay thank you very much
thats all from me for today
thank you for your assistance
No worries. Have a nice day ahead!
you too!
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Hi, this is PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1. How may I help you?
[name8] : Hi! I was wondering, because I have forgotten to bring my student card, could I still access the school library?
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Are you already in school?
[name8] : Yes.
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Do you have other forms of identification?
[name8] : Uhmmm does NRIC work?
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Hold on a sec
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Let me check
[name8] : OH! I have my student ezlink card.
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Ezlink card?
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Hi, you can use both Ezllink card and your IC for verification of your identity
[name8] : Okay! Thank you so much!
PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1 PERSON_LASTNAME_1 : Thank you and have a nice day.
[name8] : Nope that's all.
